column4: i have a noob question :) -- i'm installing flock.. how do i make a pointer to the .sh in /usr/bin .. or is that a bad idea all together?
Sorry, bad question. An icon on the desktop or a (symlink ) shortcut somewhere ?
If it's in /usr/bin, it should by executable by typing "flock.sh" in the terminal ... you can drop the .sh extension and just name it "flock" if you like that better
